sourcesContent: import getScrollOffset from"./getScrollOffset";var getElemDocumentCoords=function(a){if(!a)return null;var b=a.getBoundingClientRect(),c=document,d=c.body,e=getScrollOffset(),f=e.topOffset,g=e.leftOffset,h=document.documentElement,i=h.clientTop||d.clientTop||0,j=h.clientLeft||d.clientLeft||0,k=b.top+f-i,l=b.left+g-j;return{top:Math.round(k),left:Math.round(l),width:b.width,height:b.height}};export default getElemDocumentCoords;
